items.content_html: ModularORM is a lightweight and flexible TypeScript ORM library that enables seamless interaction with databases using predefined classes and interfaces. It simplifies development while maintaining flexibility and control over your project.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: NodeInate is a lightweight and flexible pagination library designed to make paginating large datasets easy and efficient in Node.js applications. Whether you're building APIs or web apps, NodeInate helps you break down your data into manageable chunks with minimal setup, ensuring better performance and user experience.
items.title: nodebysam/nodeinate: NodeInate is a lightweight and flexible pagination library designed to make paginating large datasets easy and efficient in Node.js applications. Whether you're building APIs or web apps, NodeInate helps you break down your data into manageable chunks with minimal setup, ensuring better performance and user experience.
